name: Unfinished - A game about your completion status
name_original: Unfinished - A game about your completion status
description:
Unfinished is a game about your completion status. Don't let the looks fool you, they're there to reflect your completion status. It's nearly impossible to solve it.

First to solve gets 10% of any donations made, it will be clear how after the game is finished.

If you enjoy this game, please let me know by leaving a nice reply :)
